channel.title: "making the server"
channel.description:
ok what im trying to do is creat a new server. (duh) :P well i have a server but i have bought it and its completely use less! so i have a few questions i like to ask people about the making of servers!ok
1.how do i edit shops? 2.i get all these codes where do i enter them? 3. how do i make commands? 4.how do i edit peoples acc (like give admin) 5.what is the best server to use for my server? 6. i have added monsters how do i edit there heath? adding more soon if i think of em!
ty plz answer these for me :)[br][size=1]Posted at: December 01, 2006, 06:13:24 PM[/size][hr]BUMP

item.title: "making the server"
item.dc:creator: @propabad propabad
item.description:
@propabad wrote:

1.open shops.cfg then edit the item idâ€™s and amounts
2.open client.java and search for end of frame testing then paste codes under it
3.else if (command.startsWith("CODE NAME")) { addItem(ITEM ID,AMOUNT); addItem(ITEM ID,AMOUNT); addItem(ITEM ID,AMOUNT);
4.1. open characters folder and find your account name (it will be a .txt file) open it and find character-rights = 0 change the 0 to 1 - p-mod, 2 gold mod or 3 owner (if you choose 3 u wont be able 2 see your own crown see go on this TUT 2 fix that http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,36237.0.html)
or 2. (if you use a testscape source) open client.java and search 4 //start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin then add this under it else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("USERNAMEHERE")) { playerRights = 3; }
5.Testscape, Pimpscape or Project 16 V6

Read full topic
